message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
A bit more reasonable, don't you think?
You're getting desperate, I can sense it. Better give in now!
Time's running out, Bob. Meet me halfway or walk away!
You're getting closer to giving in, I can see it. Don't make me wait any longer!
You're not getting away with this, Bob. It's now or never!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't make me take everything!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not backing down now.
